title: cendUril undanaDi
sahitya:
cendUril undanaDi sEra vandEn nAn kandA sharaNam enru cintai karainduruga


anupallavi

  endan kavalai tIra undan karuNai kOri vandanai purindAl un cintai kanindiDum enru


caraNam    marupurak-karai kANA karum tirai kaDal pOla karuNaikkOr uruvAgi tiruk-kATSi taruvOnE
kuraiyaTra nirai vAzhvai siriyEnum perumAru viraivil un uLLam karuNai koLLum enru
